title: Meta announces new rules for financial advertisers in bid to crack down on celebrity scam ads
description: Under two new changes, financial advertisers on Facebook and Instagram will be required to reveal who is paying for the ads and who benefits from them.
content:
Meta has bowed to pressure to tackle deep fake images of public figures and celebrities by bringing in new advertising rules to target scammers.

title: Mayor Adams says undocumented New Yorkers aren’t owed due process, defying Constitution
description:
New York City Mayor Eric Adams speaks at City Hall on November 12, 2024.
 

“The Constitution is for Americans,” Adams said, contradicting amendments that grant due process to all persons regardless of immigration status. [ more › ]
